mapper.select: --DQ Main 개선현황 차트 SQL SELECT COUNT(M.BR_ID) AS BR_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN R.BR_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS BR_ANA_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN R.ER_CNT > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS BR_ERR_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN C.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CS_CNT , SUM( CASE WHEN I.ANA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS IM_CNT , MAX(R.ANA_DGR) AS BR_ANA_DGR FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAM_BIZ_AREA B ON M.BIZ_AREA_ID = B.BIZ_AREA_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT R.* FROM WAM_BR_RESULT R WHERE ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_BR_RESULT)) R ON M.BR_ID = R.BR_ID --개선계획 LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_CS_ANA_MSTR C ON R.BR_ID = C.ANA_JOB_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = C.ANA_STR_DTM --개선활동 LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_IM_ACT_MSTR I ON C.ANA_JOB_ID = I.ANA_JOB_ID AND C.ANA_STR_DTM = I.ANA_STR_DTM WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U')

--DQ Main 품질현황 차트 SQL SELECT MAX(BR_ANA_DGR) AS BR_ANA_DGR , NVL(MAX(PRF_ANA_DGR),0) AS PRF_ANA_DGR , MAX(BR_ANA_CNT) , MAX(BR_ER_CNT) , CASE WHEN MAX(BR_ANA_CNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN MAX(BR_ER_CNT) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((MAX(BR_ANA_CNT)-MAX(BR_ER_CNT))/MAX(BR_ANA_CNT)*100),2) END ) END AS BR_QS , MAX(PRF_ANA_CNT) , MAX(PRF_ER_CNT) , CASE WHEN MAX(PRF_ANA_CNT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN MAX(PRF_ER_CNT) = 0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND(((MAX(PRF_ANA_CNT)-MAX(PRF_ER_CNT))/MAX(PRF_ANA_CNT)*100),2) END ) END AS PRF_QS FROM (SELECT MAX(R.ANA_DGR) AS BR_ANA_DGR ,SUM(NVL(R.ANA_CNT,0)) AS BR_ANA_CNT ,SUM(NVL(R.ER_CNT,0)) AS BR_ER_CNT ,NULL AS PRF_ANA_DGR ,NULL AS PRF_ANA_CNT ,NULL AS PRF_ER_CNT FROM WAM_BR_MSTR M INNER JOIN (SELECT R.* FROM WAM_BR_RESULT R WHERE ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_BR_RESULT)) R ON M.BR_ID = R.BR_ID WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS BR_ANA_DGR ,NULL AS BR_ANA_CNT ,NULL AS BR_ER_CNT ,MAX(R.ANA_DGR) AS PRF_ANA_DGR ,SUM(NVL(R.ANA_CNT,0)) AS PRF_ANA_CNT ,SUM(NVL(R.ESN_ER_CNT,0)) AS PRF_ER_CNT FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN (SELECT R.* FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R WHERE ANA_DGR = (SELECT MAX(ANA_DGR) FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT)) R ON M.PRF_ID = R.PRF_ID WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND R.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL )
